This pandemic has imposed huge burdens on economies, religions, education systems, and all social activities worldwide. There is a need to revisit free, cheap, and available plants and foods that may aid the discovery of drugs, vaccines, nutraceuticals and functional foods for prevention and treatment of COVID-19. Most of the plants and foods described in this review are cheap, accessible, and available in most parts of the world and can be easily administered.
